snippet.title: Brick Breaker Premium 2
snippet.description:
An Arcade Classic!

The sequel to the classic brick-breaker game.

You are the hero “Blippy” the paddle, that has to save planet Earth from a new threat. Can you finish the game and save Earth from “The Little Snarfers”?...

- Over 40 Brand New Challenging Levels to Complete.
- Continuation of the Heroic Storyline, Where It All Began!
- Gamepad Support.
- Classic Power-ups.
- New Additional Small Bricks.
- See Brand New Ending Cutscenes If You Can Complete The Game!!!


Lots of Fun!!! Good Luck Blippy!
